extendedInfo.description: Martian Chess is a digital recreation of Andrew Looney's classic treehouse / icehouse game now on your Android Phones and Tablets!A fun and challenging board game,similar to traditional chess, with a smaller board and much quicker game play. In Martian Chess, pieces on your side of the game board are always yours.This is a two or four player (Tablets only) game, any of which can be players or computers.It's a game of attrition and position, of challenge and strategy.If you play too offensively, your opponent can come right back at you with the piece you attacked him, for once you take their piece, your piece becomes theirs! But if you're too defensive your opponent can corner you. You must find the right balance.We hope you'll love and enjoy Martian Chess, please rate and review, and send us any feedback you have so we can make it better for you!

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: Computer gets stuck in a loop, endlessly repeating the same moves. Non tablets can only play the two player game, no for player games for phones. There needs to be better no repeat rules. Also buggy, sometimes legal moves are disallowed; in a two player game, drones cannot move from d7 to d8. This should always be a legal move. I\'d give it more stars of they fix those bugs.
reviews.author: Adam Wozniak

reviews.title: Good port
reviews.comment: I am glad someone ported this game, now if we could only get some more Looney Pyramid games. It plays well but the AI will make the same move again and again to not loose, but still good.
reviews.author: nic asman

reviews.title: Never ending... :-(
reviews.comment: This game will never get over, if played good... number of moves could be made limited...
reviews.author: Bala Kumar

reviews.title: Good game, bad AI
reviews.comment: This is great for playing against friends when you don\'t have a board, but the AI will only challenge beginners.
reviews.author: Jonathan Baker

reviews.title: Really needs a way to set AI strength
reviews.comment: Also doesn\'t detect when the game is in an infinite loop.
reviews.author: Bill Shubert

reviews.title: Wonderful game !
reviews.comment: Very good design and great AI !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: this is cool
reviews.comment: now thats a wonderful game. splendid work. :-D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice Game
reviews.comment: But can you at least attempt to make a four players game for phones?
reviews.author: Griffin Henderson

reviews.title: Excellent app!
reviews.comment: Nice work guys! Good UI  design!:)
reviews.author: A Google User
